 CxList methods = Find_Methods();

result = methods.FindByShortName("snprintf")
	+ methods.FindByShortName("_snprintf*")
	+ methods.FindByShortName("_snwprintf*")
	+ methods.FindByShortName("vsnprintf")
	;
